InfoScreen.Name: dm_info
InfoScreen.Text: Introduction to experiment Now you will be asked a series of questions. Specific instructions will follow before each question or set of questions. To answer all questions you will use the keyboard and mouse. After completing each question, please click “Next” to proceed to the following question. Press “Back” if you want to go to an earlier question to change your answer. Please complete these questions to the best of your ability. If you have any questions, please ask at any time.

TextQuestion.Name: dm_age
TextQuestion.Text: Please enter your age in years:

ChoiceQuestion.Name: dm_student
ChoiceQuestion.Text: Are you currently a student or postdoctoral fellow?

TextQuestion.Name: dm_field
TextQuestion.Text: What is your field of study?
